values.name: footer_about
values.value:
Experience Palest

Whether you are a livestock farmer or a farmer, a contractor or a forester: In the BayWa portal you will find a wide range of animal feed, seeds and crop protection - conventional or ecological In addition, you will receive detailed information about our diverse advisory services, services, events and topics as well as about us, your BayWa.
Discover our diversity - digitally and on site
